column1: Smoque BBQ////Over the years it's become apparent to me that there are two kinds of BBQ ribs in Chicago - Southside ribs and Northside ribs.  You could also say that there are juicy
column6: GOOD ribs (Southside) and ribs that make me weep that a pig was slaughtered for nothing (Northside).  But I keep hanging onto the dream that somewhere on the Northside is some miraculous place that actually knows something about seasoning
column7: smoking and saucing ribs.  So when I hear rave reviews about a BBQ rib restaurant on the Northside
column9: dive in and try it out.
